verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Blessed is He in whose hand is the sovereignty, and Who has power over everything.
verse.verse_2: He who created death and life-to test you-as to which of you is better in conduct. He is the Almighty, the Forgiving.
verse.verse_3: He who created seven heavens in layers. You see no discrepancy in the creation of the Compassionate. Look again. Can you see any cracks?
verse.verse_4: Then look again, and again, and your sight will return to you dazzled and exhausted.
verse.verse_5: We have adorned the lower heaven with lanterns, and made them missiles against the devils; and We have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.
verse.verse_6: For those who reject their Lord, there is the torment of Hell. What an evil destination!
verse.verse_7: When they are thrown into it, they will hear it roaring, as it seethes.
verse.verse_8: It almost bursts with fury. Every time a batch is thrown into it, its keepers will ask them, "Has no warner come to you?"
verse.verse_9: They will say, "Yes, a warner did come to us, but we disbelieved, and said, 'God did not send down anything; you are very much mistaken.'"
verse.verse_10: And they will say, "Had we listened or reasoned, we would not have been among the inmates of the Blaze."
verse.verse_11: So they will acknowledge their sins. So away with the inmates of the Blaze.
verse.verse_12: As for those who fear their Lord in secret-for them is forgiveness and a great reward.
verse.verse_13: Whether you keep your words secret, or declare them-He is Aware of the inner thoughts.
verse.verse_14: Would He not know, He Who created? He is the Refined, the Expert.
verse.verse_15: It is He who made the earth manageable for you, so travel its regions, and eat of His provisions. To Him is the Resurgence.
verse.verse_16: Are you confident that the One in heaven will not cause the earth to collapse beneath you as it spins?
verse.verse_17: Or are you confident that the One in Heaven will not unleash against you a violent storm? Then you will know what My warning is like.
verse.verse_18: Those before them also denied the truth; and how was My disapproval?
verse.verse_19: Have they not seen the birds above them, spreading their wings, and folding them? None holds them except the Compassionate. He is Perceiver of everything.
verse.verse_20: Or who is this who is a force for you to protect you against the Compassionate? The disbelievers are in nothing but delusion.
verse.verse_21: Or who is this that will provide for you, if He withholds His provision? Yet they persist in defiance and aversion.
verse.verse_22: Is he who walks bent on his own design better guided, or he who walks upright on a straight path?
verse.verse_23: Say, "It is He who produced you; and made for you the hearing, and the vision, and the organs. But rarely do you give thanks."
verse.verse_24: Say, "It is He who scattered you on earth, and to Him you will be rounded up."
verse.verse_25: And they say, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"
verse.verse_26: Say, "Knowledge is with God, and I am only a clear warner."
verse.verse_27: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieved will turn gloomy, and it will be said, "This is what you used to call for."
verse.verse_28: Say, "Have you considered? Should God make me perish, and those with me; or else He bestows His mercy on us; who will protect the disbelievers from an agonizing torment?"
verse.verse_29: Say, "He is the Compassionate. We have faith in Him, and in Him we trust. Soon you will know who is in evident error."
verse.verse_30: Say, "Have you considered? If your water drains away, who will bring you pure running water?"
